nodes.text: The slave revolt on the Leverage occurred around 40 BBY. The Leverage, commanded by the Czerka Corporation's Sector Supervisor Meritt Col, attempted to prevent the slaves on board from attaining freedom. However, the efforts of Jedi Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi, Pax Maripher, Rahara Wick, and several other slaves proved able to overwhelm the ship's safeguards.
The slave revolt on the Leverage first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
